body:
Valflix is a streaming service that offers a wide variety of content related to Valorant and more – on thousands of internet-connected devices.

You can watch as much as you want, whenever you want, without a single advert – all for one no price. There's always something new to discover, and new gameplays and stream moments are added every week!
Watch Valflix on your smartphone, tablet, smart TV, laptop or streaming device as much as you want, there is no fee for watching, so just signup and enjoy!

Watch your favourite streamers and valorant content creators play valorant. Learn from their gameplay and get out of iron. There are videos of the Valorant Champions tour as well if you want to catch up on some professional valorant action. You can also watch stuff related to your favourite agent like lineups and strategies deviced by your favourite players or streamers.

Valflix is flexible. There are no annoying contracts and no commitments. You can easily cancel your account online in two clicks. There are no cancellation fees – start or stop your account at any time.
